titleStmt.title: Christs vvatch-vvord Being the parable of the virgins, expounded and applyed to these times of security. Or an exhortation of our Saviours to us, that we may watch and prepare our selues for the unknowne times of death and judgement.
titleStmt.author: Johnston, Thomas, Chaplain to the Bishop of Dromore.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. I[ones] for Iohn Bartlet, and are to be solde at his shoppe at the signe of the Golden Cuppe in Cheapeside,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
